con:request.name: Create
edit

con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response=messageExchange.responseHeaders log.info response def status=response["#status#"] log.info status def respo=context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Access token").getPropertyValue("response") log.info respo def holder=new JsonSlurper().parseText(respo) def access_token= holder.data.access_token log.info access_token context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("access_token",access_token)
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response=messageExchange.responseHeaders log.info response def status=response["#status#"] log.info status
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response=messageExchange.responseHeaders log.info response def limit=response["X-Pagination-Limit"] log.info limit
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response=messageExchange.responseHeaders log.info response def status=response["#status#"] log.info status

con:config.script: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def respo=context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create Category").getPropertyValue("response") log.info respo def holder=new JsonSlurper().parseText(respo) def id1= holder.data.id log.info id1 context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("id",id1.toString())

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def respo=context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Getcategorybyid").getPropertyValue("response") log.info respo def holder=new JsonSlurper().parseText(respo) def language_id1= holder.data.language_id def name1=holder.data.name log.info language_id1 log.info name1 context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("language_id",language_id1.toString()) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("name",name1.toString())

con:restRequest.name: ModifyCategoryByid
con:restRequest.con:request: { "category_description": [ { "meta_description": "Meta description of the category", "meta_title": "meta-title", "meta_keyword": "demo, demo2", "name": "Home_Appliances${=String.valueOf(Math.random()*1000).substring(0,5)}", "description": "Description of the category", "language_id": "1${=String.valueOf(Math.random()*1000).substring(0,5)}" }], "image": "", "top": 0, "parent_id": 0, "category_seo_url": [ { "store_id": "0", "language_id": "1${=String.valueOf(Math.random()*1000).substring(0,5)}", "keyword": "Appliances${=String.valueOf(Math.random()*1000).substring(0,5)}" }], "column": "1", "category_store": [0], "category_filter": [0], "sort_order": "0", "status": "1" }

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import java.utils.*
def response=messageExchange.responseHeaders log.info response def status=response["#status#"] log.info status def expected=["HTTP/1.1 200 OK"] assert status==expected if(status==expected){ log.info "passed" } else{ log.info "not passed" }

con:config.script: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import com.eviware.soapui.model.* import java.utils.* import jxl.* import jxl.write.* def response=context.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["REST proj"].testCases["Create and Delete category"].testSteps["DeleteByid"].getPropertyValue("Response") log.info response def status=1 def holder=new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def succ= holder.success log.info succ if(status==succ){ log.info "passed" } else{ log.info "failed" } WritableWorkbook workbook = Workbook.createWorkbook(new File("C:\\Users\\MEENAKSHIK\\Desktop\\Upskill\\DataExcel\\Response.xls")) WritableSheet sheet = workbook.createSheet("Worksheet1", 0) Label Responseval=new Label(0,0,succ.toString()) sheet.addCell(Responseval) workbook.write() workbook.close()
